short_summary: Need Geospatial data visualization and mobile expertise from multiple TBIPS Streams and Categories for NRCan.
description: The objective of this requirement is to obtain the professional services of multiple IM/IT resources, from various TBIPS Streams and Categories, to support tasks related to geospatial data visualization and mobile expertise. These resources will further assist NRCan in the development of a simple and flexible viewer to display and analyze geospatial data from their metadata catalog on a map with extended functionalities. This notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and mandatory security screening will be required.
